title: A Sinful Tiger
description: Trapped on a tropical island, Devra desires tiger shape-shifter Gannon. Though his body demands he mate her, he fears his animal nature and the voodoo curse that made him this way. Only time will tell if beauty can tame the beast. [Publisher's Note: This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find objectionable: Anal sex, exhibitionism, homoerotic sex (female/female), sex while in shifted animal form, violence, voyeurism.]
author: Brenda Williamson
